title: #163: The Timeline in The Teacher's Pet
description:
The RCP Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) continue their analysis of Lyn Dawson's disappearance and focus on the timeline of events.

If you have any information about Lyn’s disappearance or the historical sex abuse at the three Sydney schools, including Cromer High, please contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.


#HerNameWasLynDawson

#TheTeachersPet

#CoerciveControl
